meta.description: Fantem Technologies Ltd. was founded in 2011. This joint venture between Aeon Labs and Yitoa Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. combines the advanced technologies from an American Silicon Valley firm with the advantages of a Chinese public company.

深圳市南山区科技园科技南五道英唐大厦5楼: 5 Keji South 5th Rd, Nanshan Qu, Shenzhen Shi, Guangdong Sheng, 518057
丰唐公司是一家集设计研发、生产、销售于一体，专注于物联网产品及无线智能家居产品的: Fantem Technologies is a high-end brand enterprise integrating design, development, production and sales, focusing on Internet of things products and wireless smart home products. Established in 2011, the company is a high-tech enterprise jointly established by American Aeon Labs LLC and Chinese YITOA ying tang zhi kong (stock code: 300131). The company is committed to providing people with safe, energy-saving, convenient and comfortable intelligent life, and is a leading smart home products and system solutions service provider. Our products meet users' daily needs while striving to highlight the sense of fashion and technology, and achieve convenient installation and simple operation. The product features comprehensive coverage, can achieve lighting, curtain, air conditioning, audio-visual equipment and other appliances intelligent control. Not only for families, but also for hotels, offices and other places.
作为Z-Wave联盟成员，丰唐物联在中国及美国都拥有一流的研发团队。迄今为止，我: As a member of the z-wave alliance, the company has a first-rate research and development team in both China and the United States. So far, we have obtained more than 100 technical patents and continuously launched new products to meet the needs of users and the market.
丰唐智能家居系统包含有网关类、开关类、传感类、控制类、照明类、安防类等多种类型的: Fantem smart home system contains a variety of products including gateway class, switch class, sensor class, control class, lighting class, security class and so on. The product features comprehensive coverage, can achieve lighting, curtain, air conditioning, audio-visual equipment and other appliances intelligent control.
丰唐物联凭借在智能家居行业多年的积淀，目前已成为国家物联网协会成员，国家高新技术: With years of accumulation in the smart home industry, Fantem has become a member of the national iot association, a national high-tech enterprise, as well as a contract and credit enterprise in guangdong province. In addition, he has successively obtained the intellectual property management system certification certificate, the 2017 smart home overseas market development award, smart home pioneer award and other important certificates and awards.
OOMI使用自主创新的Tap-and-Touch专利技术，刷新智能家居安装新定义: OOMI uses Tap-and-Touch proprietary technology of independent innovation to refresh the new definition of smart home installation: just let OOMI Touch other OOMI products, then the link can be established to achieve the OOMI system's full control of smart home. Smart home life starts with touch.
OOMI大宅系统涵盖健康、语音、安防、灯光、家电、娱乐、环境七大类产品，采用边缘: The OOMI complex system covers seven categories of products, including health, voice, security, lighting, household appliances, entertainment and environment. With edge computing technology, it can operate independently from the cloud service area and ensure that the smart home system can still work normally when the network is interrupted. The stable operation of the system will thoroughly solve the problems of the stability of wireless products in villa, duplexes and platform. The OOMI system supports multiple gateways to work together and cross gateway scene linkage. Users can centralize control through one account, or they can use different accounts for hierarchical control, which satisfies the use of all family members and the application of large systems.
安防策略提前设置 用户一键操作即可: Security policy can be set ahead of the user one key operation
释放家中遥控器 远程控制 能耗监测: Release remote control for energy consumption monitoring at home
家居安全护航，家庭健康保障: Home safety escort, family health security
扫一扫在手机上阅读本文章: Scan reads this article on your phone
OOMI智能家居大宅系统为智慧别墅提供完美解决方案，既可以通过云平台远程管理，也: OOMI intelligent home furnishing system provides perfect solutions for intelligent villas, which can be managed remotely or locally through cloud platform, realizing the management of intelligent health, intelligent voice, intelligent security, intelligent lighting, intelligent household appliances, intelligent entertainment and intelligent environment. The system adopts a unique powerful cascade scheme, which supports multi-gateway cascade and cross-gateway scene interaction. The system is stable and reliable, which completely solves the problem of wireless product application in the villa. Through the centralized control of one account, different accounts can also be used for hierarchical control, which can meet the needs of all family members. In terms of function and performance, "people-oriented" concept has been throughout, enabling people to fully experience the comfort, security, informatization and other aspects brought by the smart home system to daily life.
OOMI酒店客房控制系统是利用计算机、通讯、物联网、无线控制等技术，基于客房内的: OOMI hotel room control system is the use of computer, communication, Internet, wireless control technology, intelligent gateway based on guest room in the composition of wireless communication networks, security system of hotel guest room, entrance guard system, central air conditioning system, lighting system, environment monitoring and control system of intelligent control, reflect the state of guest room, guest demand, service conditions and device status, etc., to assist the hotel to the guest room resources monitoring and analysis. The goal of the guest control system is to make the hotel intelligent through intelligent products, create experience for users and create value for the hotel.
OOMI智慧小区管理系统，是利用物联网技术、无线控制技术、移动互联网技术，基于数: OOMI intelligence community management system, is the use of the Internet of things technology, wireless control technology, the mobile Internet technology, based on the digital intercom system, smart home, the Internet of things, realize the family lighting control, electrical home appliances control, audio control, curtain control, environmental monitoring, security management, visitors, ladder function, for the residents to create a "safe, comfortable, convenient" residential area of the living environment. The goal of smart community management system is to make home intelligent through intelligent products, create experience for users, and forge a modern smart community with characteristics of "intelligence, comfort, efficiency and security".
OOMI智慧校园管理系统，是利用物联网技术、云计算、移动互联网技术，基于智能家居: OOMI wisdom campus management system, is the use of the Internet of things technology, cloud computing, mobile Internet technology, based on the smart home, the Internet of things, realize the classroom and dormitory of lighting, projection, curtain control, air conditioning control, environmental monitoring, security management, to realize the remote control, custom setting, time management, data docking with other subsystems, provide effective basis for school management data, build wisdom campus, the teacher and the students bring convenient, fast and comfortable the wisdom of teaching experience.
八大优势 稳定可靠: Eight Advantages Are Stable And Reliable
系统可实时监测设备状态: The System Can Monitor The Equipment Status In Real Time
可实现远程喊话震慑匪徒: Can achieve long-range propaganda to deter gangsters
系统最大可支持232个节点设备: The system can support up to 232 nodes
全屋智能 一键设防 无死角安全守护: Whole house intelligence one key fortification without dead Angle security guard
无线门磁被触碰打开，会发生警报，您的手机会收到报警信息提醒，提醒您家里有不速之客: Wireless door magnet is touched open, there will be an alarm, your mobile phone will receive alarm information to remind you of unexpected guests in your home, and the main opportunity to receive a signal, high-decibel buzzer on the scene to deter, effectively deter foreign visitors!
红外人体感应，5米/120°超大范围探测，监测家中异动，智能探测人或宠物移动。智: Human body infrared sensor, 5 m / 120 ° large range detection, monitoring, home intelligent detection or pet move. Intelligent audible and visual alarm, effectively deter foreign intruders, mobile phone easy to check all indoor conditions.
安全管家——智能有害气体传感器: Safety steward - intelligent hazardous gas sensor
红稳定监测到可能影响您与家人身体健康的空气污染物的存在，例如CO、PM2.5、V: Red stability monitors the presence of air pollutants that may affect the health of you and your family, such as CO, PM2.5, VOC, etc. When the concentration of gas detected by the sensor is higher than the set concentration, there will be a double reminder of sound and light flashing and a notice will be sent to the mobile phone, timely warning, so that you can master the air quality in the first time and make relevant protective measures in time.
实时水体感应，兼具水位控制和漏水浸漫提醒功能。可通过手机APP实现预设安防场景，: Real-time water sensing, water level control and water leakage warning. The preset security scene can be achieved through the mobile phone APP. Once the water level is monitored to the preset height, the remote alarm will be prompted immediately to let you know and take countermeasures. At the same time, the joint intelligent robot can automatically close the water valve, so that you can also remote control outside, so that you save your heart, rest assured.
出厂前己提前设置好布防、撤防模式: Before leaving the factory, it has set the defense and removal mode in advance
一键设置撤防模式、居家模式、离家模式。支持门锁、门磁、智能人体红外传感器、智能有: One key set off the mode, home mode, away from home mode. Support the combination and linkage of multiple security equipment including door lock, door magnet, intelligent human infrared sensor, intelligent harmful gas sensor and intelligent camera. To achieve a key away from home at the same time cut off the lights and non-essential electrical power supply, and security work began; Go home when a key to remove defense, to meet all your needs for home security!

家的安全，亲人的安全，一直是我们的渴望。: The safety of home, the safety of loved ones, has always been our desire.
您可以通过智能操控平板 Oomi Touch 或手机，随时随地观察室内外的闭路监: You can use the smart control panel Oomi Touch or mobile phone to observe the closed circuit monitoring points inside and outside the room anytime and anywhere, and can view the earlier images through the local storage card or cloud video. In addition, Oomi intelligent security system is equipped with multiple defense defenses. Once an intruder is found, it will trigger the intelligent security system and automatically alarm the host or relevant security personnel, timely notify the host or relevant security personnel, timely prevent the occurrence of illegal and criminal ACTS, and protect personal interests from infringement. At the same time, the Oomi intelligent security system is not only limited to the functions of prevention, but also includes the humanized functions such as the monitoring of fire and gas leakage and the emergency alarm of the elderly and children.
当您周末与三五好友相聚时，在家中开启一场久违的party时，只需轻轻一键，窗帘关: When you get together with your friends over the weekend and open a long-lost party at home, just press a button, the curtains close, the lights flicker, and music rings at the right time to create the most appropriate atmosphere for the party, making the friendship of friends even longer. When you are at leisure, when you are alone or with your family and want to enjoy a warm film and listen to beautiful music, you only need to press the button, the light will be automatically dimmed, the curtain will be closed, the video and sound playing system will start successively, the projector and screen will slowly drop, and the air conditioner will be automatically adjusted. OOMI intelligent entertainment scene provides you with more fashionable audio-visual effects and a more comfortable and comfortable viewing environment.
智能娱乐 满足所想: Smart entertainment is what you want
聚会模式 一键开启: Party mode opens with one button
一键开启聚会模式。周末约上三五好友，来家中开启一场久违的Party！在闪烁的温暖: Open party mode with one key. Make an appointment with three or five friends over the weekend to open a long-lost Party at home! In the twinkling warm light, the appropriate music, let the old friends friendship even longer.
饭后，坐在客厅一键开启影院模式，影院布帘缓缓降下，窗帘会悄然关闭，灯光自动调节到: After dinner, sit in the living room and open the cinema mode with one button. The curtain of the cinema will slowly fall down, and the curtain will close quietly. The light will be automatically adjusted to the appropriate brightness.
当您悠闲地坐在露台凝望夕阳西下时，当您在与爱人共进烛光晚餐时，当您在午后的起居室: When you sit on the patio and watch the sun set, when you have a candlelit dinner with your sweetheart, when you are reading your favorite poems in the afternoon sitting room, when you are enjoying wine with your best friend, when you are relaxing at the SPA in your home... Wonderful music will make you even more intoxicated.

智能一、二、四路开关: Intelligent one, two, four way switch
OOMI智能家居系统支持家用电器远程无线智能操控，能让您轻松控制家里的电器，并监: OOMI smart home system support household appliances remote wireless intelligent control, allows you to easily control the home appliances, and monitor the working state of the electrical and energy consumption, real-time detection of electricity in the home situation, analysis of electrical power consumption, electricity data according to you, from the source to optimize power combination, science to save energy for you, let the life more convenient, more environmentally friendly, saving every penny for you!
OOMI智能家居节点设备支持定时开关的功能，您可以关闭没有必要长期待机的家电，智: The OOMI smart home node device supports the function of timing switch. You can turn off the home appliances that do not need to be standby for a long time. With intelligent control of kitchen and bathroom appliances, the power supply is cut off regularly.
一键离家 智能红外感应: One key away from home intelligent infrared induction
一键离家：只需一键点击，即可离家，并且自动关闭家中的灯光及电器；智能红外感应：人: One key to leave home: only one click can leave home, and automatically shut the lights and appliances in the home; Intelligent infrared induction: people come to light, people go out, intelligent induction human movement.
实时监控家用电器工作状态及能耗，支持实际功率检测和用电量查询，使用OOMI智能家: Monitor the working status and energy consumption of household appliances in real time, support the actual power detection and power consumption query, and use the OOMI smart home system to easily know. Let you clearly understand the electrical appliances, more scientific use of electrical appliances, reduce unnecessary standby time, energy conservation and environmental protection.
远程开关 一键可控: Remote switch is controlled by one key
手机远程遥控，随时随地一键可控。各类电器的电源、开关状态在手机上一目了然！每当离: Mobile phone remote control, whenever and wherever a key control. Various electrical power supply, switch status on the phone at a glance! Whenever leaving home for a business trip, you don't have to worry about turning off the lights or turning off the electrical appliances. With OOMI APP, you can check at any time on your phone, control the power switch, and operate with one key.
组网简单 轻松拓展: Network is simple and easy to expand
组网设置超乎想象的简单！OOMI 使用自主创新的 Tap - and - Tou: Networking is incredibly simple! OOMI USES the Tap - and - Touch patent technology of independent innovation. Only by making OOMI Touch other OOMI products, OOMI can establish a connection and realize the OOMI system's full control of intelligent home appliances! The system can support up to 232 node devices and easily extend new devices.
